trans-unit.source: Represents the visual appearance of the control when it is in a specific state.
trans-unit.target: Representa a aparência visual do controlo quando se encontra num estado específico.

trans-unit.source: A VisualState specifies how the control looks when it is in a certain state.
trans-unit.target: Um VisualState Especifica como o controlo de procura quando faz parte de um determinado Estado.

trans-unit.source: For example, when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is pressed, its border might be a different color than normal.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>é premido, o limite pode ser uma cor diferente que o habitual.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The VisualState class has a <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Storyboard%2A> property that changes the appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: A classe de VisualState tem um <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Storyboard%2A>propriedade o aspecto do controlo é alterado.</xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the control enters the state that is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Storyboard%2A> begins.
trans-unit.target: Quando o controlo aciona um Estado de que é especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Storyboard%2A>começa.</xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the control exits the state, the <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Storyboard%2A> stops.
trans-unit.target: Quando o controlo sai do Estado, o <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Storyboard%2A>interrompe.</xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.States%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property contains VisualState objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.States%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade contém objetos de VisualState.</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup.States%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup> objects are added to the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups%2A?displayProperty=fullName> attached property, which is defined on the on a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>objetos que são adicionados para o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ligado propriedade, o que está definida no no <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.VisualStateGroup>

trans-unit.source: You can add VisualState objects to any <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, but they are typically are used in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar objetos VisualState a qualquer <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>, mas são, normalmente, são utilizados num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> and VisualState objects for existing controls, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>e VisualState objetos para os controlos existentes, consulte [personalizar o aspeto de um controlo existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For an example of using VisualState objects outside of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de utilização VisualState objetos fora de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>consulte a <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>classe.</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You specify which visual state an element should enter by passing the Name of the <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> to the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>.
trans-unit.target: Especifique o estado visual deve introduzir um elemento transferindo o nome da <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>para <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>.</xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> </xref:System.Windows.VisualState>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> uses the <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, the control author should specify which <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objects the control expects to find in its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> by putting the <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute> on its class signature.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>utiliza o <xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager>num <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, o autor do controlo deve especificar que <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>objetos controlo espera encontrar no respetivo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>colocando a <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute>na respetiva assinatura de classe.</xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.VisualState> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.VisualStateManager> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> authors define new <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objects and set the Name property to the value specified by the <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>os autores definem novos <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>objetos e defina a propriedade de nome para o valor especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.TemplateVisualStateAttribute.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.VisualState></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To find the names of the visual states for the controls that are included with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], see [Control Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para localizar os nomes dos Estados de visual para os controlos que estão incluídos com [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], consulte [estilos do controlo e modelos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For information about how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> and <xref:System.Windows.VisualState> objects for existing controls, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como criar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>e <xref:System.Windows.VisualState>objetos para os controlos existentes, consulte [personalizar o aspeto de um controlo existente, criando um ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.VisualState> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> that defines the appearance of the control when it is in the state that is represented by the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> que define o aspecto do controlo quando se encontra num Estado que é representado pelo <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When the control enters the state that is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the Storyboard begins.
trans-unit.target: Quando o controlo aciona um Estado de que é especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>começa a propriedade, o Storyboard.</xref:System.Windows.VisualState.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the control exits the state, the Storyboard stops.
trans-unit.target: Quando o controlo sai do Estado, deixa de guião gráfico principal.

trans-unit.source: A storyboard that defines the appearance of the control when it is in the state that is represented by the <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um guião gráfico principal que define o aspecto do controlo quando se encontra num Estado que é representado pelo <xref href="System.Windows.VisualState"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
